title: The tastiest lasagne ever
ingredients: ['oil, as needed for cooking', '1 green pepper, seeded and diced', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 to 2 handfuls mushrooms, diced', '3 large cloves garlic, crushed and diced', '2 onions, diced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'dried basil, to taste', '300g beef mince', '1 (500g) jar tomato lasagne sauce', '2 splashes ruby port (my secret ingredient!)', '1 (500g) jar white lasagne sauce', '1 packet lasagne sheets', '300g Cheddar cheese, grated', '50g to100g fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced']
